# NAME
oxDNA - coarse-grained simulator for DNA, RNA, etc

# SYNOPSIS

| **oxDNA** \<_input\_file_\> [_key_=_value_]

# DESCRIPTION

THe oxDNA command is used to perform actual oxDNA simulations.

# OPTIONS

The first argument, \<input_file\>, is the path to the file containing all the simulationsâ€™ settings. It can be followed by a list of key=value pairs that overwrite the options found in the input file.

# SEE ALSO

/usr/share/doc/oxdna-cuda/html/input.html - input file information
